Detailed Description

This Scheduler is the Nucleus Scheduler implementation. The Scheduler always runs in the context of the RTOS task. Scheduler functions in turn calls AppContext functions to switch the context. Scheduler's setjmp and AppContext's longjmp changes the context from Scheduler to AppContext. AppContext's setjmp and Scheduler's longjmp changes the context from AppContext to Scheduler.

void Scheduler::Reschedule (   )  [virtual]
 

Takes away control from the currently active Application to Scheduler's context. Scheduler lets the next Application resume.

Implements AbstractScheduler.

void Scheduler::SendMsg (  const Application *  app,
Message &  msg
)  [virtual]
 

Wakes up and gets the AppContext for the receiving Application. Saves the Scheduler's context and does a context switch to the AppContext's SendMsg, which sends a message to the Application.

Parameters:
app the receiving Application
msg the Message to be sent

Implements AbstractScheduler.

virtual void Scheduler::StartUp (   )  [virtual]
 

Starts all AppContexts, which are then ready to receive messages.

Implements AbstractScheduler.

void Scheduler::StartUp (   )  [virtual]
 

Traverses the list of AppContexts and starts them one by one. The AppContexts are then ready to receive messages.

Implements AbstractScheduler.

virtual void Scheduler::Wait (  const Application *  app,
const Condition &  cond
)  [virtual]
 

Takes away control from the Application until the next Message arrives. Will return once the Condition becomes TRUE.

Parameters:
app the Application that will wait for the Condition
cond the Condition to wait for

Implements AbstractScheduler.

void Scheduler::Wait (  const Application *  app,
const Condition &  cond
)  [virtual]
 

Takes away control from the AppContext of the receiving Application, until the next Message arrives. Will return once the Condition becomes TRUE.

Parameters:
app the Application that will wait for the Condition
cond the Condition to wait for

Implements AbstractScheduler.
